full_summary:
**Title**
T8518-220026 Request for Proposal - 3-in-1 Jackets

**Contract Details**
Reference Number: WS4692230478-Doc4692291466
Solicitation Number: WS4692230478

**Procurement Details**
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Notice Type: Request for Proposal
Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Time-sensitive Date:*
Public Posting Date: July 18, 2024
Tender Closing Date: September 5, 2024, 14:00:00
Expected Contract Start Date: October 3, 2024
Expected Contract End Date: October 20, 2029

**Scope of Work**
The Transport Canada department is seeking to procure Navy Anti-static 3-1 Jackets with the following specifications:
- 400 units firm, to be delivered to Ottawa
- Optional quantities up to 10,000 units within a 60-month period from contract award date

**Trade Agreements | Accords Commerciaux**
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
WIPO (Convention for the Protection of Producers of Phonograms Against Unauthorized Duplication of Their Phonograms)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Peru Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contact Information**
Darya Kritova, Bidness Phone number/Email:  [darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Website Link for RFX: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20366953?extsite=MjAzNjY5NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
